deposit(uint256).details: Since this contract needs to be supplied with rewards we are  sending the balance of the contract if the pending rewards are higher

params._amount: The amount of staking tokens to deposit

getStakeTokenFeeBalance().details: Obtain the stake token fees (if any) earned by reflect token

returns._0: wei balance of rewards left to be paid

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._bonusEndTime: The timestamp when rewards will end

params._rewardPerSecond: The amount of reward tokens to be given per second

skimStakeTokenFees(address).details: Remove excess stake tokens earned by reflect fees

params.token: The address of the BEP20 token to sweep

totalStakeTokenBalance().details: Obtain the stake balance of this contract

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: The amount of staking tokens to withdraw

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit staking token into the contract to earn rewards.

getStakeTokenFeeBalance().notice: If STAKE_TOKEN == REWARD_TOKEN there are no fees to skim

getUnharvestedRewards().notice: Get the balance of rewards that have not been harvested

rewardBalance().notice: Obtain the reward balance of this contract

sweepToken(address).notice: A public function to sweep accidental BEP20 transfers to this contract.   Tokens are sent to owner

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw rewards and/or staked tokens. Pass a 0 amount to withdraw only rewards
